It seems like the goals are 1) to preserve good answers and 2) to get broader audience for answers not getting attention here, yes?

If so, maybe have HelpBot come in a few hours after the last activity on the question to ask about moving the content over to Discourse? (Instead of immediately)

That would keep it fairly simple and reduce the noise.
